name: C-ZERO
description:
You are a recruit of the V-Troopers, the main force of the Asteroid Vesta. Your duty is to test experimental weapons using a combat car that the enforcers will use on the battlefield. Your goal is to resist for 150 seconds, planning every shot. Only one rule: Don’t be hit.

C-ZERO (Carsteroids Zero: Troopers Training Ground) is a spin-off, played by the point of view of the V-Troopers, one of the antagonists of the main game Carsteroids.

Press [F] to toggle fullscreen. 
Press [M] to toggle music. 
Press [ESC] or [P] to open in-game menu.
Press [F1] to open my STEAM dev page.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS 
[Z] Fire/Select 
[X] Reload 
[Up] Accelerate 
[Down] Brake/Reverse 
[Left/Right] Steer 
[S] Use Item: Shield 
[D] Use Item: Drug 
[SPACE] Use Item: Bomb
[ESC] or [P] open in-game menu

GAMEPAD CONTROLS (xbox compatible)
[A] Fire/Select
[B] Reload
[RT] Accelerate
[LT] Brake/Reverse
[Left Analog] Steer
[Y] Use Item: Shield
[X] Use Item: Drug
[LB] Use Item: Bomb
[Start] Open in-game menu
[D-pad] Menu Navigation
